**Sustainable Food Truck**: Launch a sustainable food truck that serves plant-based, locally sourced, and organic meals. Partner with local farmers and suppliers to source ingredients and reduce food waste. Offer a menu that changes seasonally and incorporates unique flavors and ingredients. Use social media and local events to promote the studio and attract customers who appreciate handmade craftsmanship.
